```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(plotly)

df <- mtcars[which(mtcars$hp < 150),]

map <- plot_ly(df, x = ~hp, y=~cyl) %>%
        add_annotations(x = df$hp, y = df$cyl, text = rownames(df))

p <- plot_ly(
  x = c("giraffes", "orangutans", "monkeys"),
  y = c(20, 14, 23),
  name = "SF Zoo",
  type = "bar"
)

m <- hist(mtcars$mpg)

```

Here is a chart made through plotly using the mcars dataset.
